sources.title: The Shiralee
sources.description: When Jim Macauley finds his wife with another man, he takes their young daughter and they hit the road. With a young child as his responsibility, he finds he can't be quite the fancy-free wanderer that he had been.

metadata.Plot: When Jim Macauley finds his wife with another man, he takes their young daughter and they hit the road. With a young child as his responsibility, he finds he can't be quite the fancy-free wanderer that he had been.
metadata.Writer: D'Arcy Niland, Neil Paterson, Leslie Norman
metadata.Actors: Peter Finch, Dana Wilson, Elizabeth Sellars
